But I have <S%H1129>built<s%> you a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2073>habitation,<s%> and a <S%H4349>place<s%> for you to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"

<S%H3117><s%> 'Since the day that I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> I <S%H977>chose<s%> no <S%H5892>city<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H8034>in,<s%> that my name might be <S%H977>there;<s%> neither chose I any <S%H376>man<s%> to be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>
but I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that my <S%H8034>name<s%> might be <S%H977>there;<s%> and have chosen <S%H1732>David<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'

Now it was in the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3824><s%> 'Whereas it was in your heart to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name,<s%> you did <S%H2895>well<s%> that it was in your <S%H3824>heart:<s%>

<S%H7535>nevertheless<s%> you shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house;<s%> but your <S%H1121>son<s%> who shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of your <S%H2504>body,<s%> he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name.<s%>'

<S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6965>performed<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> that he <S%H1696>spoke;<s%> for I have risen <S%H6965>up<s%> in the place of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>promised,<s%> and have <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H8033>There<s%> I have <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> in which is the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

He <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the presence of all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%>

(for <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H3595>scaffold,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high,<s%> and had <S%H5414>set<s%> it in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5835>court;<s%> and on it he <S%H5975>stood,<s%> and kneeled <S%H1288>down<s%> on his <S%H1290>knees<s%> before all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven;<s%>)

and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> there is no <S%H430>God<s%> like <S%H8064>you,<s%> in heaven, or on <S%H776>earth;<s%> you who <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> with your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> who <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you with all their <S%H3820>heart;<s%>

who have <S%H8104>kept<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that which you <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H1696>him:<s%> yes, you spoke with your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and have <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it with your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as it is this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

"Now <S%H3068>therefore,<s%> Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that which you have <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, <S%H3772><s%> 'There shall not fail you a <S%H376>man<s%> in my <S%H6440>sight<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> if <S%H7535>only<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to their <S%H1870>way,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H8451>law<s%> as you have <S%H3212>walked<s%> before <S%H6440>me.<s%>'

Now <S%H3068>therefore,<s%> Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> let your <S%H1697>word<s%> be <S%H539>verified,<s%> which you <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

"But will <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H552>indeed<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with <S%H120>men<s%> on the <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H8064>Behold,<s%> heaven and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3557>can't<s%> contain <S%H1004>you;<s%> how much less this house which I have <S%H1129>built!<s%>

Yet have <S%H6437>respect<s%> for the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and to his <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H7440>cry<s%> and to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> which your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prays<s%> before <S%H6440>you;<s%>

that your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may be <S%H6605>open<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> even toward the <S%H4725>place<s%> where you have <S%H559>said<s%> that you would <S%H7760>put<s%> your <S%H8034>name;<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> which your <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place.<s%>

<S%H8085>Listen<s%> to the <S%H8469>petitions<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place:<s%> <S%H8085>yes,<s%> hear from your <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> even from <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and when you <S%H8085>hear,<s%> <S%H5545>forgive.<s%>

"If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and an <S%H423>oath<s%> is <S%H5375>laid<s%> on him to cause him to <S%H422>swear,<s%> and he <S%H935>comes<s%> and <S%H422>swears<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H4196>altar<s%> in this <S%H1004>house;<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H8199>judge<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> bringing <S%H7725>retribution<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> to <S%H5414>bring<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> on his own <S%H7218>head;<s%> and <S%H6663>justifying<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> him according to his <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

"If your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H5062>struck<s%> down <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H7725>you,<s%> and shall turn again and <S%H3034>confess<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> and make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you in this <S%H1004>house;<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> which you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to them and to their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

"When the <S%H8064>sky<s%> is shut <S%H6113>up,<s%> and there is no <S%H4306>rain,<s%> because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H6419>you;<s%> if they pray toward this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H2403>sin,<s%> when you afflict <S%H6031>them:<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when you <S%H3384>teach<s%> them the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> in which they should <S%H3212>walk;<s%> and <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> on your <S%H776>land,<s%> which you have <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5971>people<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

"If there is <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> if there is <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> if there is <S%H7711>blight<s%> or <S%H3420>mildew,<s%> <S%H697>locust<s%> or <S%H2625>caterpillar;<s%> if their <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6887>besiege<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H8179>cities;<s%> whatever <S%H5061>plague<s%> or whatever sickness there <S%H4245>is;<s%>

whatever <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and <S%H8467>supplication<s%> be made by any <S%H120>man,<s%> or by all your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who shall <S%H3045>know<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his own <S%H5061>plague<s%> and his own <S%H4341>sorrow,<s%> and shall spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house:<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> your <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive,<s%> and <S%H5414>render<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> according to all his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> you <S%H3045>know;<s%> (for <S%H3045>you,<s%> even you only, know the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men;<s%>)

that they may <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3212>you,<s%> to walk in your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> so long <S%H3117>as<s%> they <S%H2416>live<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> which you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

"Moreover concerning the <S%H5237>foreigner,<s%> who is not of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when he shall <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> for your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H2389>sake,<s%> and your mighty <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and your <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm;<s%> when they shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house:<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> even from your <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> to you <S%H5971>for;<s%> that all the peoples of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H5971>you,<s%> as does your people <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that this <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"If your <S%H5971>people<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> by whatever <S%H1870>way<s%> you shall <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6419>them,<s%> and they pray to you <S%H1870>toward<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> which you have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for your <S%H8034>name;<s%>
then <S%H8085>hear<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> their <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and their <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> and <S%H6213>maintain<s%> their <S%H4941>cause.<s%>

"If they <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H120>you<s%> (for there is no man who <S%H2398>doesn't<s%> sin), and you are <S%H599>angry<s%> with <S%H5414>them,<s%> and deliver them <S%H6440>to<s%> the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> so that they carry them <S%H7617>away<s%> <S%H7617>captive<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> far <S%H7350>off<s%> or <S%H7138>near;<s%>

yet if they shall <S%H7725>repent<s%> themselves in the <S%H776>land<s%> where they are carried <S%H7617>captive,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H2603>again,<s%> and make supplication to you in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2398><s%> 'We have sinned, we have done <S%H7561>perversely,<s%> and have dealt <S%H7561>wickedly;<s%>'

if they <S%H7725>return<s%> to you with all their <S%H3820>heart<s%> and with all their <S%H5315>soul<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> where they have carried them <S%H7617>captive,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> their <S%H776>land,<s%> which you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> which you have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> and toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for your <S%H8034>name:<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> even from your <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place,<s%> their <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and their <S%H8467>petitions,<s%> and <S%H6213>maintain<s%> their <S%H4941>cause,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> who have sinned against <S%H2398>you.<s%>

<S%H430>"Now,<s%> my God, <S%H5869>let,<s%> I beg you, your eyes be <S%H6605>open,<s%> and let your <S%H241>ears<s%> be <S%H7183>attentive,<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> that is made in this <S%H4725>place.<s%>

"Now therefore <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> into your <S%H5118>resting<s%> <S%H727>place,<s%> you, and the ark of your <S%H5797>strength:<s%> let your <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8668>salvation,<s%> and let your <S%H2623>saints<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H2896>goodness.<s%>

<S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7725>don't<s%> turn away the <S%H6440>face<s%> of your <S%H4899>anointed.<s%> <S%H2142>Remember<s%> your loving <S%H2617>kindnesses<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>"
